section.title: Feature summary
section.para:
New Features new since previousversion:
Better integration with Linux operating systems with native RPM and Debian packages Improved logging and integration with system log rotation tools Improved scalability and reliability

listitem.simpara: Uniform and flexible interface to local resource managers
File staging before and after job execution
File and directory clean up after job termination
Condor SEG module is no longer included. Its functionality has been moved into the core of the job manager program.
